name: Grow For Hope
description:
Grow for Hope came from the JAM for Hope,  a jam about  designing games meant to motivate and uplift those struggling illness and grief. Grow for Hope is about the struggle of climbing out of that dark and lonely place.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys

Credits:

Programming - Alexis Lapina

Art - Dennis McCorry (FunnyBird)

Music - @bclikesyou

Writing - Ashley Valdés Garcell
